name: Editors' picks
tagline: A collection of our absolute favourite gifts. There is a guaranteed winner in here.
description: This curated collection of Editor’s Picks is your insider’s shortcut to the very best gifts on the market. Each item has been hand-selected by our team of gifting enthusiasts and design obsessives, seeking out products that balance style, function, and delight. From show-stoppers and handcrafted delights to small but mighty tools that spark joy, these are the gifts we’d be thrilled to give—or receive—ourselves.

gifts.name: Ember mug 2
gifts.description: The mug you didn't know you need but absolutely do

gifts.name: SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush
gifts.description: Brush up on eco-credentials: this sleek electric toothbrush uses replaceable heads and recyclable materials for a dazzling, guilt-free smile.

image.alt_text: Image of SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: RAINS Classic Jacket
gifts.description: Who says rain gear has to be boring? This RAINS jacket keeps you dry in sleek, minimalist style. Umbrella optional.

image.alt_text: Image of RAINS Classic Jacket. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush
gifts.description: A great facial cleanser that you can travel with.

image.alt_text: Image of FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Marshall travel speaker (mini)
gifts.description: Stylish and portable with a great sound. This is the ideal speaker to take away with you.

image.alt_text: Image of Marshall travel speaker (mini). A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Votch Watch Gift Set
gifts.description: Time to upgrade your or their wristwear. This vegan-friendly watch gift set comes with two stylish straps for swapping looks as easily as your mood.

image.alt_text: Image of Votch Watch Gift Set. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Kitchen aid classic mixer
gifts.description: The mixer we all want but struggle to justify. Do it, you know you want to.

image.alt_text: Image of Kitchen aid classic mixer. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Away carry on luggage
gifts.description: Travel in style with the perfect carry-on suitcase from Away. Feeling cool? Opt for the suitcase with built-in battery for all your charging needs.

image.alt_text: Image of Away carry on luggage. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Opinel Bread Knife
gifts.description: This legendary French blade slices through crust and crumb with ease. Welcome to artisanal bread bliss.

image.alt_text: Image of Opinel Bread Knife. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Family sleep spray duo
gifts.description: Want to sleep well? Want the whole family to sleep well? This pair of sprays is the your answer

image.alt_text: Image of Family sleep spray duo. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: MEATER meat thermometer
gifts.description: Cook to perfection every time with the best smart thermometer there is

image.alt_text: Image of MEATER meat thermometer. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Foldable Bike Helmet
gifts.description: Helmet when you need it, stash it when you don't. This folding helmet makes safety as portable as your commute.

image.alt_text: Image of Foldable Bike Helmet. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Allbirds Tree runners
gifts.description: Step into sustainable comfort. These breezy, tree-based sneakers feel like walking on clouds. Feet and the planet will thank you.

image.alt_text: Image of Allbirds Tree runners. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Fujifilm Instax mini evo instant camera
gifts.description: Snap, tweak, print! This hybrid instant camera lets you preview shots, add filters, and watch your memories develop in seconds.

image.alt_text: Image of Fujifilm Instax mini evo instant camera. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Slip silk eye mask
gifts.description: Treat your eyes with the luxurious slip eye mask. Soft, delicate and a joy to sleep in.

image.alt_text: Image of Slip silk eye mask. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Marcato pasta maker
gifts.description: A classic italian design. In a ferrari red.

image.alt_text: Image of Marcato pasta maker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: FC 26
gifts.description: FC 26 (formerly known as Fifa) is the must-have game for the new season. Is there a better way to spend your time between match days?

image.alt_text: Image of FC 26. A great gift to give the football fan gamer special.
